parlimenthuwata idiripath kara athi aparadhayaka windithayin saha sakshikaruwan hata sahaya dima saha aaraksha kirime panath ketumpathata shreshtadhikaranaya sanshodhana yojana kara athi bawa niyojya kathanayaka chandima wirakkodi mahatha eeye (09) danwa sitiyeya.shreshtadhikaranaya wisin yojana kara athi sanshodhana panath ketumpatha ekathu kirimata yatathwa ema panath ketum path widhiwidhana kisiwak aandu krama wyawasthawata anukulawa (patahani) nowana bawata shreshtadhikaranaya thiranaya kara athayi wirakkodi mahatha danwa sitiyeya.aandukrama wyawasthawe 123(1) wana wyawasthawata anuwa shreshtadhikaranaya me thiranaya gena thibe.mema panatha shreshtadhikaranaya hamuwe abhiyogayata lakwuye aandukrama wyawasthawe 121(1) wyawasthanata anuwaya.
